summary: This is a kind of, unofficial DLC for Skyrim. It starts when you go to the Bee and Barb and talk to Mylice.
descriptionHtml:
The Felmir Cult is a lore friendly-ish, long, and rewarding (if you like video game currency) mod that adds an entire new cult to Skyrim known as the Felmir, a group of monster hunters and dungeon clearers/looters.[color=#ff0000] 
<br />[/color][size=6] [color=#ff0000]ALWAYS REMEMBER BEFORE PLAYING: [/color][color=#efefef]If you have ANY graphical enhancing mods whatsoever, turn them off, because this will not be compatible with any graphical mods, ENBs, and mesh improvements.[/color][/size]
author: 565Doodle
